item.title: Transfer this to pi?
item.dc:creator: @nickypie nickypie
item.description:
@nickypie wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:4, topic:457203”][quote author=nickypie link=topic=560136.msg4090418#msg4090418 date=1346276086]
Make the class 8 into ItemDef or what ever you are trying to change it too, and the IF(I into a case statement.
[/quote]
Not even close.

I almost deleted this, lucky for you I didn’t.

[code=Java]
// Convert Class8 to Itemdef.

class8.aStringArray189 =         => itemDef.actions =
class8.aStringArray189[1] =      => itemDef.actions[1] =
class8.anInt190 =                => itemDef.modelRotation1 =
class8.anInt198 =                => itemDef.modelRotation2 =
class8.anInt181 =                => itemDef.modelZoom =
class8.anInt169 =                => itemDef.modelOffset1 =
class8.aByteArray178 =           => itemDef.description =
class8.aString170 =              => itemDef.name =
class8.aBoolean176  =                => itemDef.stackable =
class8.anInt165 =                => itemDef.maleEquip1 =
class8.anInt200 =                => itemDef.femaleEquip1 =
class8.anInt204 =                => itemDef.anInt204 =
class8.anInt175 =                => itemDef.anInt175 =
class8.anInt197 =                => itemDef.anInt197 =
class8.anIntArray156 =           => itemDef.originalModelColors =
class8.anIntArray160 =           => itemDef.modifiedModelColors =
class8.anInt164 =                => itemDef.maleEquip2 =
class8.anInt188 =                => itemDef.femaleEquip2 =
class8.anInt194 =                => itemDef.modelOffset2 =
class8.anInt174 =                => itemDef.modelID =

//begin converting

[/code][/quote]

well i was hopping he would get the rest lol.

Read full topic

Not even close.

I almost deleted this, lucky for you I didn’t.

    // Convert Class8 to Itemdef.
     
    class8.aStringArray189 =         => itemDef.actions =
    class8.aStringArray189[1] =      => itemDef.actions[1] =
    class8.anInt190 =                => itemDef.modelRotation1 =
    class8.anInt198 =                => itemDef.modelRotation2 =
    class8.anInt181 =                => itemDef.modelZoom =
    class8.anInt169 =                => itemDef.modelOffset1 =

    class8.anInt200 =                => itemDef.femaleEquip1 =

    class8.anInt197 =                => itemDef.anInt197 =

    class8.anIntArray160 =           => itemDef.modifiedModelColors =
    class8.anInt164 =                => itemDef.maleEquip2 =
    class8.anInt188 =                => itemDef.femaleEquip2 =

item.description:
@light6 wrote:

Can someone help me transfer this code to pi? Im a new coder and not that well at it i just want to see how its done. Thanks! if(i == 9119) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[5]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[5]; class8.anInt174 = 3288; class8.anInt181 = 2000; class8.anInt190 = 500; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -6; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt204 = 14; class8.anInt165 = 3287; class8.anInt200 = 3287; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt199 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Death Cape"; class8.aByteArray178 = "The cape worn by masters of PKing. -Master Monk- ".getBytes(); }
